_header: When all sooths ben sought and seen
Title(s): ‘Suffre in tyme and þat is beste’
_description: ‘Suffre in tyme and þat is beste’ — six 12-line and one 8-line stanzas with this refrain

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Whon alle sothes ben souht and seeneEuerichone at heore
                    denys…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þer bi God and vre ladiSuffre in tyme and þat is
                    beste

                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
Whon in alle soþes be souht & seenEuerichone at heore
                    deuys…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Þer bi god and vre ladySuffre in tyme and hit is
                    beste
